| History                 = The Goblin Army became [[Norman Osborn (Earth-616)|Norman Osborn]]'s enterprise following the fall of the [[Goblin Nation (Earth-616)|Goblin Nation]], allying himself with [[Katarina Karkov (Earth-616)|Countess Katarina Karkov]] of [[Symkaria]] to produce arsenal of inmense power and create a clandestine weapon-supplying global network.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 4 26}}

The Goblin Army fell apart after [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] and [[Silvija Sablinova (Earth-616)|Silver Sable]] invaded Symkaria to overthrow its rulers. Osborn attempted to grow the army in numbers by gassing the inhabitants of the country with [[Goblin Formula|Goblin Serum]], but [[Barbara Morse (Earth-616)|Mockingbird]] and [[Wild Pack (Earth-616)|Wild Pack]] disabled the missle which intended to fulfill that purpose.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 4 28}}
